metadata.title: Fundamental Relationships for CIDOC-CRM
metadata.description: Binary shortcut relationships between Fundamental Categories (Thing, Actor, Place, Event/Time, Concept) mapped to CIDOC-CRM property paths. Each path represents a traversal through intermediate event/entity nodes that the FR collapses into a direct relationship.
metadata.c1_object_note: C1.Object = E70_Thing NOT (E21_Person, E55_Type, E30_Right, E41_Appellation)

event_to_time_conversion.note: Any Event-based FR can be converted to a Time-based FR by appending: E5_Event --P4_has_time-span--> E52_Time-Span

paths.description: Thing depicts Place directly
